thread.title: PDX Street Style: Portland Fashion Week
thread.title_full: PDX Street Style: Portland Fashion Week | OregonLive.com

author: Beth Nakamura | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: PDX Street Style: Portland Fashion Week
text:
This week, PDX Street Style visits Portland Fashion Week , a four-day event highlighting the work of local fashion designers. The annual event opened Thursday and featured a themed runway show, Sustainable Fashions.
Scroll the gallery for a look at the scene in the hours leading up to the show. And be sure to check the captions for information about the people and what they're wearing.
Suggestions for PDX Street Style? Leave them in the comments.
--Beth Nakamura 503-221-8218
Twitter: @bethnakamura
Instagram: @bethnakamura
